activities.name: Log Start
activities.description: record when the Bronze load for a given file begins.

activities.name: Log End - Success
activities.description: record when the Bronze load for a given file ends.

activities.name: Log End - Fail
activities.description: record when the Bronze load for a given file ends with a failure.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT TableName
  FROM Control.FolderTableMap
 WHERE FolderName = '@{substring(item().FileName,0,lastIndexOf(item().FileName,'-'))}'

text.value:
@concat(
  'UPDATE Control.FileList SET Status=''Completed'', EndTime = SYSUTCDATETIME(), RowsProcessed = ',
  string(activity('Copy Src to Bronze Table').output.rowsCopied),
  ' WHERE FileListId = ',
  string(item().FileListId),
  ';'
)

activities.name: List Source Folders
activities.description: discovers the source directories (park-data, squirrel-data, visitor-log) without naming them.

activities.name: ForEach Source Folder
activities.description: process each source in isolation—simplifies logging and error handling.

activities.name: Filter Folders
activities.description: ChildItems returns both files and folders; we only want folders at this level.

activities.name: Get File List
activities.description: dynamically points at source folder and lists all its CSVs for today’s run.

activities.name: Filter Files
activities.description: ensures only .csv files get processed (ignore any stray non‑CSV).

properties.description: loads every dimension in one place
loads every dimension in one place

activities.name: Capture Workload Metrics
activities.description: Writes PDW node‐level CPU/IO/storage metrics into Telemetry.workload_snapshot.

activities.name: Capture DMV State
activities.description: Populates Telemetry.DMV_Snapshot with current DMV stats.

activities.name: Capture Request Details
activities.description: Inserts rows from sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests into Telemetry.Requests_Snapshot.

activities.name: Capture Query Store Snapshot
activities.description: Pulls runtime and plan stats from the Query Store into Telemetry.QS_Snapshot.
